spec_data.Name: alsa-plugins-upmix
spec_data.Description:
The upmix plugin is an easy-to-use plugin for upmixing to 4 or
6-channel stream.  The number of channels to be expanded is determined
by the slave PCM or explicitly via channel option.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 14 Nov 2017 04:48:37 AM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Upmixer channel expander plugin for ALSA
